Developed lovingly in the Summer of 2020 during the SG Circuit Breaker by Foo Chuan Le, Nicholas @wonderfoo97 

This app aims to model your climbing proficiency through an implementation of the ELO rating. A rating of 4 means that the probability that you flash a problem of grade 4 is 0.50. 

Main screen: 
Type in a gym name and add gym, your rating is initialised to 0 
Long hold on a gym entry to delete
Tap a gym entry to go to your rating there 

Gym rating: 
Problem grade: an integer based on the gym's grading, lowest is 0, next lowest is 1 etc. 
Attempts: number of attempts to send the problem, 0 for unsent 
Repeats: number of times you've repeated the problem (more means its actual grade is lower because you're familiar 
New grade: computes your new rating at this gym 
Undo: rolls back your rating to the previous one (in case of erroneous insertions) 
Set new climber grade: if you want to transfer data from another device, or want to calibrate yourself higher than 0 
Set: sets your rating to the entry above, undo is possible
